Key Match Events: Jason Holder took 5 wickets for 27 runs
Jason Holder achieved a hat-trick in the match
James Vince scored 55 runs off 35 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Holder was awarded the Player of the Match and Player of the Series award
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados
The match was a day-night (20-over match)
